alma.scheduling.planning_mode_sim.master_scheduler
Interface ControlProxy

All Known Implementing Classes:
ControlSimulator
public interface ControlProxy

The ControlProxy interface specifies those methods needed by Scheduling from the Control system. The methods are implemented by the ALMADispatcher and by the ControlSimulator.

Version:
1.00 Jul 18, 2003
Author:
Allen Farris

execSB

public void execSB(short subarrayId,
                   java.lang.String id,
                   DateTime time)
            throws SchedulingException
Execute the SB with the specified identifier on the specified sub-array at the specified time.

Parameters:
subarrayId - The subarray on which to execute the SB.
id - The entity-id of the SB to execute.
time - The time at which the SB is to be started.
SchedulingException

Get the current active sub-arrays.
